message: How do you feel about the new photo display in Facebook? I like the on-black view, and more slideshow layout with arrows, etc, but it limits my direct interaction with the notifs icon etc. Not sure about that.
It should allow for the Header to still be clickable for sure. Also if you resize the window while the lightbox is open, it breaks positioning.
I really want to make it go full screen, but I can't.
I don't think I can anyway.
It was startling at first, but have gotten used to it since and it definitely makes the experience more enjoyable.
